transcript_parts.text: in with the red and out with the blue
are you tired of the same old saying
and predictable smooth living
are these old structures and
institutions an insult to your security
and
intelligence do you lean on words like
homogamy
heterodoxy freedom an oppression to
hammer home your opinions
are you the type to hop on twitter
facebook
youtube and even more obscure platforms
to cajole
or when necessary goal caps to defend
your position
or to change minds or denigrate
have you lost faith in the norm
will you say that you'll go to any
lengths to make this world a better
place
but no you won't for you
is all democratized unity forced
oppression
then you are red team red will fulfill
your needs
join team red and together we will
do nothing but genuinely feel we are
so remember out with blue church and
with red religion
